data_table.description: This subject phenotypes data table includes study visit, anthropometric measurements (n=4 variables; height, BMI, waist, and hip), blood pressure (n=6 variables; systolic, diastolic, and ankle-brachial), medications (n=4 variables; blood pressure, hypertension, diabetes, and lipid), blood measurements (n=99 variables; cholesterol, blood factors, rbc, wbc, whole blood, platelet rich plasma, aggregation for epinephrine or ADP, inflammatory markers), urinary creatinine, menstruation and menopause status (n=3 variables), CT measurements (n=2 variables), food intake, carbon monoxide exposure, and smoking status (n=7 variables).

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Study visit
variable.value: sibling study visit: first possible study visit for siblings only
platelet study visit: platelet function assessment study visit, first possible visit for offsprings and co-parents of offspring

variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Age

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Gender of participant
variable.coll_interval: collected at first visit: sibling visit for some, platelet visit for some

variable.name: RACE
variable.description: Race of participant
variable.coll_interval: collected at first visit: sibling visit for some, platelet visit for some

variable.name: HT
variable.description: Height

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body mass index (calculated as weight (kg) / height (m) ^2 )

variable.name: WST
variable.description: Waist circumference

variable.name: HIP
variable.description: Hip circumference

variable.name: SBPAVE
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (average of 3 measurements)

variable.name: DBPAVE
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (average of 3 measurements)

variable.name: SBP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (average of 4 measurements)
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (average of 4 measurements)
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits

variable.name: BPRX
variable.description: Blood pressure medication

variable.name: HBPORRX
variable.description: Hypertension (measured blood pressure >= 140/90mmHg and/or current antihypertensive medication)

variable.name: DIABRX
variable.description: Diabetes medication

variable.name: DIABETIC
variable.description: Diabetes (measured glucose > 125 mg/dl and/or current hypoglycemic oral medication or insulin)

variable.name: LIPRX
variable.description: Lipid medication

variable.name: GLUC
variable.description: Glucose

variable.name: INSUL
variable.description: Insulin

variable.name: TC
variable.description: Total cholesterol

variable.name: TG
variable.description: Triglycerides

variable.name: HDL
variable.description: HDL cholesterol

variable.name: LDL
variable.description: LDL cholesterol (calculated using Friedewald formula)

variable.name: FIBRINOGEN
variable.description: Fibrinogen

variable.name: VWF
variable.description: Von Willebrand Factor

variable.name: CO
variable.description: Exhaled carbon monoxide

variable.name: SMOKENOW
variable.description: Current smoking
variable.value: yes, regularly within the past month

variable.name: CIGSDAY
variable.description: Cigarettes per day

variable.name: SMOKWK
variable.description: Days per week smoke
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits
variable.value: usually on one day or less

variable.name: EVERSMOK
variable.description: Ever smoked cigarettes

variable.name: YRSSMOK
variable.description: Years since stopped smoking cigarettes
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits

variable.name: SMOKMAX
variable.description: Maximum daily number of cigarettes
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits

variable.name: SMOKAGE
variable.description: Age began to smoke
variable.coll_interval: collected at platelet, coronary CT, and vascular study visits

variable.name: WBC
variable.description: White blood cell count

variable.name: HGB
variable.description: Hemoglobin

variable.name: HCT
variable.description: Hematocrit

variable.name: PLT
variable.description: Platelet count

variable.name: RBC
variable.description: Red blood cell count

variable.name: MCV
variable.description: Mean corpuscular volume

variable.name: MCH
variable.description: Mean corpuscular hemoglobin

variable.name: MCHC
variable.description: Mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration

variable.name: RDW
variable.description: Red blood cell distribution width

variable.name: MPV
variable.description: Mean platelet volume

variable.name: LYMPHNO
variable.description: Lymphocyte number

variable.name: LYMPHPCT
variable.description: Lymphocyte percent

variable.name: MONONO
variable.description: Monocyte number

variable.name: MONOPCT
variable.description: Monocyte percent

variable.name: GRANNO
variable.description: Granulocyte number

variable.name: GRANPCT
variable.description: Granulocyte percent

variable.name: PCT
variable.description: Platecrit

variable.name: PDW
variable.description: Platelet distribution width

variable.name: atpcaa
variable.description: Whole Blood: ATP Release Arachidonic Acid 0.5 mM corrected for platelet count

variable.name: atpcadp
variable.description: Whole Blood: ATP ADP (adenosine diphosphate) 10 uM corrected for platelet count

variable.name: atpcc1
variable.description: Whole Blood: ATP Release Collagen 1 ug/ml Aggregation corrected for platelet count

variable.name: atpcc5
variable.description: Whole Blood: ATP Release Collagen 5 ug/ml Aggregation corrected for platelet count

variable.name: pfact
variable.description: PFA-100: Collagen/Epinephrine Closure Time

variable.name: WHYSTER
variable.description: Ever had hysterectomy

variable.description: Both ovaries removed

variable.description: Natural menopause

variable.name: CTCALCIUM
variable.description: Coronary calcium Agatston score
variable.coll_interval: collected at sibling visit and CT visit

variable.name: CTSCANNER
variable.description: CT scanner protocol used to assess coronary calcium
variable.coll_interval: collected at sibling visit and CT visit
variable.value: Siemens Volume Zoom Multidetector Row CT in 200msec with slice thickness of 3mm, 2002
Siemens Volume Zoom Multidetector Row CT in 300msec with slice thickness of 3mm, 2003-2007
Siemens SOMATOM Definition Flash dual-source multidetector CT with slice thickness of 3mm, 2009-2012

variable.name: CCIMT
variable.description: Common carotid IMT

variable.description: Left ankle-brachial index

variable.description: C-reactive protein

variable.description: Monocyte chemoattractant protein 1

variable.description: Most recent food or beverage intake
